title: Latest updates: East Midlands Live Friday 17 November 2017 - BBC News
summary: police appeal over relaunched murder probe .
friends jailed over fatal race crash .
driver arrested after car crashes into river .
hospital 's a & e department could face changes .
children in need updates throughout the day .

documents.title: leicester 35-27 sale
text: leicester 35-27 sale

documents.title: leicester city 0-2 manchester city
text: leicester city 0-2 manchester city
author: Patrick Jennings
BBC Sport

documents.title: fulham 1-1 derby county
text: fulham 1-1 derby county

documents.title: birmingham city 1-0 nottingham forest
text: birmingham city 1-0 nottingham forest

documents.title: our live coverage has ended
text: that 's it for another week of east midlands live .
normal service resumes on monday at 8:00 .

documents.title: east midlands weather update : a dry but frosty night ahead
text: it will be mostly dry tonight and cloudy with a few clear spells .
scattered showers will spread southwards in the early hours and there 'll be a patchy frost with lows of 2c ( 36f ) .
author: Alexandra Hamilton
BBC weather presenter

documents.title: market changes after fall in trade
text: derbyshire dales district councillors have decided to make changes to ashbourne 's markets .
at a meeting last night they said the market would move to the civic square and will only run during the summer .
the changes come after a fall in the number of stalls on the market place .
the council has now warned if it does n't start making money by the end of 2018 they 'll shut it altogether .
the saturday market will also move to shrovetide walk .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: facebook live : children in need in nottingham
text: we 're live behind the scenes at the albert hall in nottingham as more than 200 children prepare to sing their hearts out for bbc children in need later tonight .
pudsey is on hand for moral support
author: Amy Harris
Reporter, BBC East Midlands Today

documents.title: pupils learn about indian war history
text: children from robert shaw primary school in nottingham gained an insight into what world war one was like for indian soldiers today .
dr irfan malik from nottingham spoke to year three pupils and staff about his two great-grandfathers who were indian muslim soldiers and fought in ww1 alongside the british army .
during the assembly he also spoke about the importance of remembrance day for all communities and faiths .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: police appeal over relaunched murder probe
text: delivery driver michael pritchard was run over by a man trying to steal his van in kirk langley on 12 november , 1997 .

more than 20 years after his death , derbyshire police has relaunched its murder inquiry , and is asking the public for more information on the man who stole the sherpa van , as well as two other men who were in a bedford rascal van .
det insp toby fawcett-greaves , who is leading the investigation , said the force has had five calls since they reopened the case .
author: Liam Barnes
BBC News Online

documents.title: river-plunge crash four escape car
text: river-plunge crash four escape car

documents.title: a46 crash causes delays
text: there 's been a crash on the saxondale roundabout near bingham involving three vehicles .
emergency services are on the scene , but there are queues .
crews from # londonroad # westbridgford and # newark are currently in attendance at a road traffic collision involving three vehicles on # saxondaleisland .
firefighters are working alongside @ twitterid and @ twitterid # bluelightday
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: foxes face tough battle against league leaders
text: pep guardiola 's manchester city are the glamorous visitors to the king power stadium tomorrow , and leicester city will need to dig deep to stop the away side chalking up a tenth successive league win .
foxes boss claude puel says it 's important his side stand up to the challenge posed by the league leaders .
it 's important for us to believe in our quality .
it 's important to think we have fantastic quality .
we want to see what we can do against this team .
we respect them but we do n't fear them .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: hospital 's a & e department could face changes
text: there could be more changes to out of hours care at newark hospital .
the town 's accident and emergency department was downgraded to an urgent care centre five years ago .
health officials are now looking at whether to change it to an urgent treatment centre , which will operate 24 hours a day .
author: BBC Radio Nottingham

documents.title: crash car lifted out of river
text: the car which smashed through a bridge and into the river derwent has now been removed .
author: Quentin Rayner
East Midlands Today chief news reporter

documents.title: children in need : matthew helped to walk and talk
text: three-year-old matthew was born with nodular heterotopia , a brain disorder that has left him unable to walk and talk unaided .
mum lucie gregory said school for parents , a charity supported by funds raised through children in need , has been crucial to helping her son .
author: Children in Need

documents.title: friends jailed over fatal race crash
text: friends jailed over fatal race crash

documents.title: children in need : children 's choir to perform at albert hall
text: as ever excitement is building ahead of an action-packed evening of events for children in need .

at the albert hall in nottingham , children will be singing in unison with hundreds of others across the uk , and east midlands today will be talking to some of the people who benefit from the fundraising activities .
author: Anne Davies
Presenter, BBC East Midlands Today

documents.title: pair jailed over 'high speed race ' crash deaths
text: two men have been jailed over a fatal crash caused by two cars racing each other at `` frightening '' speeds .
driver kyle o'connor and passenger gurdip singh kareer died when a honda smashed through the central reservation of the a52 near bramcote and into the path of a lorry .

learner driver latham wilbraham , 23 , pleaded guilty to causing death by dangerous driving , while 25-year-old kyle bennett , from hucknall , admitted aiding and abetting causing death by dangerous driving .
the pair were jailed for six years at nottingham crown court over the crash in november 2016 .
the judge described the men 's racing as `` absolutely appalling and a disaster waiting to happen '' .
author: Sarah Teale
Reporter, East Midlands Today

documents.title: driver arrested after river crash
text: a man has been arrested after a car carrying four people plunged into a river in derbyshire .
the vehicle smashed through a bridge at duffield and landed upside-down in the derwent .
its driver and passengers suffered only minor injuries .
a 22-year-old man has been arrested on sus of driving while under the influence of alcohol , said derbyshire police .
the crash happened at about 02:45 this morning .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: m1 accident causes delays
text: one lane is closed on the m1 northbound between junctions 24 and 24a , near kegworth , because of an accident .
it happened in the roadworks area and is causing congestion down to junction 23a near derby .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: river crash : work to limit pollution risk
text: the environment agency is working with derbyshire police this afternoon to remove the car which crashed into the river derwent .
the ea said they were also working to `` minimise the risk of pollution '' in duffield .
four people who were in the car were taken to the royal derby hospital with minor injuries .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: jail for drug dealer caught with cs gas
text: a drug dealer caught with a cs gas canister after being chased by police has been jailed .
officers were alerted to ben bond 's car , which had been linked to drugs crime , in canal street , nottingham .
he pulled over and ran , but was chased and arrested .
bond was found in possession of cannabis , cash and weighting scales - and the canister was discovered in the back of his car .
small amounts of cannabis , another set of scales , deal bags and more cash was found during a search of bond 's home address in cotgrave , nottingham crown court heard .
the 27-year-old pleaded guilty to being in possession of class a drugs with intent to supply , being in possession of cannabis and being in possession of a cs gas canister .
yesterday , he was jailed for five years .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: crews tackle barn fire
text: a barn was completely gutted after a fire broke out in east markham .
nottinghamshire fire and rescue service were called to plantation road at about 03:40 .
fire crews said the barn , which is connected to a domestic property , was `` well alight and smoke and flames could be seen from a distance '' .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: parkinson 's sufferer boosted by new treatment
text: when a parent becomes ill it can have a devastating impact on their children .

father-of-five jonathan wright , from leicester , was diagnosed with parkinson 's aged only 39 , but underwent deep brain stimulation treatment at the queen 's medical centre to help control the symptoms of the disease .
he said the treatment has helped to give him his life back and look positively to the future .
author: Liam Barnes
BBC News Online

documents.title: call the midwife calendar created by qmc staff
text: maternity staff at the queen 's medical centre have created their very own call the midwife-themed calendar .
money raised will go towards the refurbishment of the breakfast room for patients at the hospital in nottingham .
staff from ward c29 organised their sponsors , outfits and locations for the photoshoot .
students from new college nottingham did the hair and make-up , with by saul isacc photography .
you can buy calendar on the hospital 's website .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: leicester tigers name team for sale clash
text: the autumn internationals may be in full swing , but premiership rugby marches on as ever , and leicester have announced their team to take on sale sharks on sunday .
tom youngs captains a side deprived of a number of internationals , including england 's george ford and jonny may , as the tigers look for a sixth successive win in the league .
team named | your tigers side for sunday afternoon 's return to premiership rugby action against the sale sharks at welford road .
# leivsal
sale certainly have their threats and we know we will have to deliver on the things that are important to us , '' matt o'connor .
we 're missing some internationals but the guys in the environment understand that this is their opportunity to contribute and perform , '' matt o'connor .
genge must be chomping at the bit !
benched last week , released from england squad and then on the bench .
i feel for the sale boys as he comes on with 20-30 to go !
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: could former manager cotterill come back to haunt forest ?
text: relegation-threatened birmingham city are the opposition for notitngham forest this weekend , with former forest boss steve cotterill having taken over the championship strugglers .
the blues have n't scored for four consecutive league games , so mark warburton 's side will be eyeing up three points from their trip to st andrew 's as they look to break into the play-off places .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: changes to tram and bus services for light switch-on
text: there will be changes to the bus and tram services in nottingham during the christmas light switch-on at the old market square this evening .
tram operator net said there will be no service between nottingham station and the royal centre between 19:00 and 20:30 .
nottingham city transport said bus services will be withdrawn on beastmarket hill and angel row for some time .
here 's what it looked like last year .
the event will kick off at 19:00 with live performances before the lights are switched on at 20:00 by nottingham 's mayor mike edwards and the sheriff glyn jenkins .
winter wonderland and the ice bar will also open today .
this year 's ice bar has a narnia-esque theme .
nottingham 's motorpoint arena has warned it 's customers to allow `` plenty of time '' to reach the venue if they are coming to see the james blunt concert tonight .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: children in need : sports group helps change children 's lives
text: a wide range of community groups and special projects across the uk are supported by funds raised through children in need .
one of them is derby-based sporting futures , which works in deprived areas to give young people the chance to take part in activities and socialise with each other .
author: Children in Need

documents.title: man found with £ 10,000 worth of illegal tobacco
text: a man who claimed he was being paid to look after illegal tobacco worth £ 10,000 has been ordered to carry out unpaid work .
osman abdullah hamarashid said he was paid £ 50 a day to mind tobacco in his car that was being sold in radford road in nottingham .
nottingham city council said the 33-year-old from birmingham was arrested after an investigation by trading standards in december last year .
the products , which had a street value of £ 4,755 , were a mixture of counterfeit items , foreign labelled and non-duty paid products , the court heard .
hamarashid pleaded guilty to possession of tobacco at a previous hearing but was found guilty of two counts to supplying tobacco at a trial yesterday .
he received 120 hours of unpaid work and was ordered to pay £ 200 court costs and £ 85 victim surcharge at nottingham magistrates ' court .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: children in need : syrian refugees helped to settle in nottingham
text: it 's children in need today , and as ever people across the country will be doing their best in aid of good causes .
bilal , ehab and their family are among the people who have been helped over the last year , with funds raised for them to settle into a new life after fleeing the fighting in syria .
author: Children in Need

documents.title: weather watchers : bright but frosty friday
text: the sun might be shining brightly , but it 's a rather chilly november day out there .
tony the ta took the photo above of the frosty start to the day at wollaton park , while lady lola was up in the hills near matlock before the mist had risen .
down in loughborough it was much brighter , as scrappy 's sunny snap shows .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: derwent crash occupants 'lucky to get out '
text: the landlady of a pub in duffield has described the scene of this morning 's crash .
mandy gager , landlady of the nearby bridge inn , said she heard people shouting and screaming in the middle of the night but did not realise there had been an accident until she got up later .
she said : `` it was about 03:00 in the morning , i heard a couple of lads really shouting quite loudly and a girl screaming .
`` one was really shouting quite loudly but i could n't understand what they were saying .
`` obviously i wish i had known what was going on as we could probably have helped them .
`` they were lucky to get out , with how they 've wiped the bridge out , they were lucky to get out of it . ''
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: tories win three seats at bingham town council by-election
text: the conservative party won three seats at the bingham town council by-election last night .
the seats became vacant after a number of independent councillors resigned , accusing the tories of `` bullying and intimidation '' .
however , the party has denied the accusations .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: derwent crash : four people escape with minor injuries
text: derbyshire police has confirmed there were four people in the car which crashed into the river derwent in duffield .
the force added no-one was seriously injured .
the road remains closed so the bridge can be repaired .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: residents advised to keep windows shut after factory fire
text: firefighters are still dealing with the blaze at the sofidel tissue factory in leicester .

residents in the hamilton , humberstone heights and thurmaston areas have all been advised to keep windows closed for the next 24 hours by leicestershire fire and rescue service to protect themselves from smoke .
author: Liam Barnes
BBC News Online

documents.title: watch : east midlands weather outlook
text: sorry for the delay in bringing you today 's weather forecast , we have had some technical issues .
here is how today is looking
author: Alexandra Hamilton
BBC weather presenter

documents.title: more from tissue factory fire
text: there is still smoke coming from the sofidel tissue factory at hamilton industrial park in leicester .
emergency services remain at the scene of the fire which broke out at about 04:00 .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: car crashes through bridge into river derwent
text: here 's a photo of the car that crashed into the derwent in duffield .
amazingly , no-one was seriously hurt .
thanks to the derby telegraph for the

documents.title: nottingham to host national teacher conference
text: a national conference will be held in the city today to discuss ways to improve teacher recruitment .
the event , which has been organised by nottingham 's education improvement board , will also focus on staff workloads and teacher retention .
there will be key speakers from ofsted , the national education union , the department for education and the school employment and teacher retention division .
councils and schools from across the country will attend the event at the belfry hotel .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: car crashes into the river derwent
text: a car has crashed through a stone parapet bridge and into the river derwent in duffield .
derbyshire police said the vauxhall insignia hit the bridge at the turning between makeney road and duffield road before ending up in the river .
the driver who suffered minor injuries was taken to hospital .
it happened at about 02:45 this morning .
makeney road remains closed in both directions while the bridge is repaired .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: 'increase in cyclists using bike lanes '
text: the number of people cycling in two parts of nottingham has more than doubled since new specialist bike lanes were opened , according to the city council .

the authority says automatic cameras measured a daily average of more than 1,000 people a day using the dedicated cycle way along castle boulevard and over 2,000 on the route along abbey street near the queen 's medical centre .
here 's a timelapse of cyclists on the castle boulevard lane this morning .
eleanor page , from cycling campaign group nottingham people on bikes , said : `` it is great news , cycling is the future .
we have got a very polluted city , we have got problems of obesity the more people on bikes , the less people using the roads which means less congestion . ''
author: Hayley Compton
Reporter, BBC Radio Nottingham

documents.title: watch : crews tackle tissue factory fire
text: here 's the scene of the fire at the sofidel tissue paper factory in leicester .
author: Helen McCarthy
BBC Radio Leicester Reporter

documents.title: 'large fire ' at tissue factory
text: about 40 firefighters are currently tackling what has been described as a `` large fire '' in leicester .
eight crews were called to the sofidel tissue paper factory at hamilton industrial park just after 04:00 this morning .
it is thought the machinery at one of the industrial units on waterside road went up in flames .
hilltop road is currently closed .
author: Helen McCarthy
BBC Radio Leicester Reporter

documents.title: watch : disabled dance group 'means everything ' to pupil
text: sidekick dance is a youth dance group for young people with disabilities from across leicestershire .
it 's one of the local projects to receive a grant from money raised for bbc children in need .
its existence helps people like marcus with his social life outside of school .
author: Helen McCarthy
BBC Radio Leicester Reporter

documents.title: travel : updates from across the region
text: travel : updates from across the region
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: join us for today 's live coverage
text: good morning nottinghamshire , derbyshire , leicestershire and rutland .
liam barnes and i will be writing the updates on today 's live page , bringing you all the latest news , sport , weather and travel .
if you 'd like to get in touch with us , you can send an email , or use facebook or twitter .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live
